app_descript:
Brief: Shimeji offers an innovative live wallpaper experience by bringing a collection of animated mascots to your device's background. With regular updates featuring new characters and animations, Shimeji aims to ascend to the pinnacle of customization apps. Users are encouraged to contribute to its journey by trying out the app and providing honest feedback. For those curious about the creators behind the characters, Shimeji has an in-app Credits section dedicated to the artists.
